meanings.definition: People who sail or travel all the way around something, especially the world.
meanings.sent1: The group of circumnavigators completed their journey around the globe.
meanings.sent2: Many famous explorers in history were skilled circumnavigators.
meanings.sent3: The circumnavigators had a race to see who could travel around the world the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the tales of old, the circumnavigators were seen as brave adventurers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the circumnavigators sailing into the sunset stayed in their minds forever.

meanings.sent1: The lone circumnavigator set out on a solo journey around the world.
meanings.sent2: As a circumnavigator, she had seen places many only dream of.
meanings.sent3: The young circumnavigator always had interesting stories to share with friends.
meanings.sent4: The circumnavigator's spirit of exploration inspired others to follow their dreams.
meanings.sent5: Becoming a circumnavigator was his ultimate goal, and he achieved it with determination.
